name: Email Labeler
description: Labels emails according to your label definitions. Make sure that the labels exist in gmail first!
workflow_start_message:
Please create something that applies my existing inbox labels to new incoming emails. 
 
 Here's a template you can follow: 
 1) Create a trigger new_email 
 2) Get my current labels using list_email_labels and tell the user their labels (this is NOT a step, use this yourself to get more context) 
 3) For each specific label, generate a description using generate_label_description(label_name) (this is also NOT a step, it's for your context) 
 4) LLM step that labels the incoming email 
 5) Agent step that applies the label to the email
